about_the_game:
Official QQ opinion collection: 724527637

Already launched on GooglePlay and QooApp

Game introduction:

    "Dragon Summon" is a strategy-based turn-based trading card battle game, as well as Roguelike card game play, operating hearthstone, simplifying the combat elements of Magic, while retaining the variety of battles It also makes up for the common problem that card games have always been difficult to use. The game is independently designed and developed by Xinyou7, and can be operated with a tight mouse. The game has 5 major professions to choose from, and there are 10 heroes and more than 200 cards to collect. You will play the role of a summoner who explores the mysteries of the Akara continent, and follow the path of the prophet's silent study. All cards can be obtained in the game. You need to use the hero skills, creature cards, magic cards and equipment cards in your hand to form a set of formed decks, and explore various genres of play as you like. Different heroes form different battle models according to their unique occupations and skills. Nearly 500 cards make the battle elements rich and diverse. In addition, you can also compete online with players from all over the world!

Gameplay:

    The game is mainly divided into two modes: PVE (Adventure) and PVP (Player Versus). Three creature cards will be dispatched in each battle. After death, a tomb will be formed. One mana is cleared, or you can wait for two rounds. eliminate. After clicking "battle" at the bottom right, the bio card will automatically fight against the enemy
    PvE map mode: You can get cards, gold coins, and crystals by completing tasks by pushing the map.
    PvE Tavern: Play against computers of the same level
    PvP competitive mode: match real players, you will get gold coins, diamonds, and glory points in battle, and you will get rich rewards every season
    PvP friends discussion: you can add friends through the chat channel, click on the name, or you can find friends through the user id in the social menu to add, and you can directly learn after you become friends
    PvE "Dragon Purgatory Tower" Roguelike gameplay: each layer of guards is generated by player data, and if they fail to fall to the bottom of the tower, rewards will increase every five layers, and every fifth layer has a chance to get a dragon card

How to get gold coins:

    1. Daily tasks
    2. Go on an adventure
    3. Victory in the battle

How to get crystal:

    1. Achievement task
    2. Sell cards
    3. Victory in the battle

How to get heroes:

    1. Shop diamond purchase
    2. Sign-in rewards

How to get cards:

    1. Go on an adventure
    2. Task
    3. Shop for diamonds or gold coins purchase
    4. End of season rewards
    5. Direct purchase of picture books

How to operate the battlefield:

    1. There are three places on the battlefield to place cards. You can place cards by dragging with the mouse. Placing cards requires energy
    2. The newly placed card will be in a sleep state. When the card is not in sleep state, you can drag the mouse to attack the enemy card or hero. The action of the card does not need to consume energy
    3. Cards on the battlefield can move their positions, and become a sleep state after moving
    4. Cards can be sacrificed. Drag the cards to the right side of the hand card area to get more energy after sacrifice
    5. After the card dies, it will turn into a tombstone for a round. Click it to spend 1 point of energy to dig the grave
    6. Skill cards can be directly dragged and released towards the target
    7. The equipment card can be dragged to the hero, and equipped on the hero, it will consume a little durability
    8. Each hero has three skills. After the skills are recharged, you can drag the mouse towards the target to release them. Each round can only release one skill at most
    9. There is a battle record button at the bottom left of the battlefield, you can view the cards summoned in the battle

short_description: "Dragon Call" is a non P2W card game. In the ancient war, the demigods expelled the Dragon Legion, but the effects of the war will never disappear. For thousands of years, intruders often ravaged the land. Now the summoners rise, they can use the energy of the earth to summon various helpers.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
